fulltext:
EXPERIENCE

companies, listed company
•
Prepare budget and plan for jobs

Review tax, accounting for foreign companies

•
Main clients: Samsung, FPT, Ford, Toyota, IBM,….

Co., Ltd
From April 2020 – August 2021
Description
•
Review tax, accounting for clients in various industry 
sectors: service, manufacturing, information technology
•
Consulting, communicating to customers, individuals...
•
Coach, train and develop staff to upgrade their knowledge.
•
Main clients: Japanese companies, Korea companies.

Sep 2015 – Mar 2020

companies, Non-profit organization
